column1: (Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 16 January 2025, for next 24 hours)
Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places

column2: Kankasanthurai to Matara via Trincomalee and Pottuvil. Showers or thundershowers will occur at

column1: several places in the other sea areas around the island during the afternoon or Night.

column2: Winds will be north-easterly and speed will be (30-40) kmph. Wind speed can increase up to (50-
60) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from Colombo to Kankasanthurai via
Puttalam and Mannar and from Matara to Pottuvil via Hambantota. Wind speed can increase up

column1: to 50 kmph at times in the other sea areas around the island.

column2: The sea areas off the coasts extending from Colombo to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam and Mannar
and from Matara to Pottuvil via Hambantota will be rough at times. Other sea areas around the

column1:
T
island may be fairly rough at times.
